Like, how do you not believe that?’ It’s the truth.” Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/people-jussie-smollett-idINKCN1Q30CO published on 2019-02-14 04:06:09

- However, others have kept their posts up, like Lena Waithe, Lee Daniels, and Harris, and have yet to comment on Smollett’s charges. Actress Yvette Nicole-Brown wrote of her original statement, “I won’t delete it. It’s how I felt. I don’t hide from how I feel or what I stand for, even as situations change.” Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/variety/celebrities-politicians-react-to-jussie-smollett-arrest-this-story-is-pathetic-idUSL3N20G6WR published on 2019-02-21 23:11:51

- When the alleged assault on Smollett was originally reported on Jan. 29, many celebrities were outspoken with their support. Since then, some have deleted their posts following Smollett’s arrest, like Jordan Peele, Michael B. Jordan, and Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/variety/celebrities-politicians-react-to-jussie-smollett-arrest-this-story-is-pathetic-idUSL3N20G6WR published on 2019-02-21 23:11:51

- Kamala Harris, who kept her maiden name, has only one sister, Maya Harris , according to an obituary for their mother, Shyamala Harris, and multiple profiles documenting the senator’s political rise. Reference: https://www.factcheck.org/2019/02/no-evidence-sen-harris-smollett-are-related/ published on 2019-02-28 18:40:12

- "Among them is Sen. Kamala Harris of California, who originally called the reported attack an “attempted modern day lynching.” She has since said the new developments in the Smollett case left her “ sad, frustrated, and disappointed.” Reference: https://www.factcheck.org/2019/02/no-evidence-sen-harris-smollett-are-related/ published on 2019-02-28 18:40:12

- Smollett, 36, an openly gay African-American who plays a gay character on the hip-hop drama “Empire,” made the comments in an interview with ABC News that is set to air on “Good Morning America” on Thursday. An interview clip was posted online. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/people-jussie-smollett-idINKCN1Q30CO published on 2019-02-14 04:06:09
correction_response:
This tweet is potentially misleading as it was made before the revelation that Jussie Smollett was charged with filing a false police report and disorderly conduct for allegedly staging an attack. While Kamala Harris initially supported Smollett, she later expressed disappointment with the developments in the case. There is no evidence to suggest that Harris is related to Smollett, contrary to some social media conspiracy theories. 
References: 
https://www.factcheck.org/2019/02/no-evidence-sen-harris-smollett-are-related/
https://www.reuters.com/article/variety/celebrities-politicians-react-to-jussie-smollett-arrest-this-story-is-pathetic-idUSL3N20G6WR
note_1_text: This is completely false. It was not a modern day lynching. Instead it was an actor who staged an attack on himself because he was unhappy with his salary.     https://time.com/5534599/jussie-smollett-staged-hate-attack/?amp=true
note_2_text: Another Birdwatch Note is correct in saying that as of 9/2021, It was known that Smollett staged the attack. It is misleading though, as it neglects to point out that the Tweet was made 8 months prior to the findings.   Context- at the time, the claim was believed to be true. https://time.com/5534599/jussie-smollett-staged-hate-attack/?amp=true https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jussie_Smollett_hate_crime_hoax

refute_evidences: - "Chicago Police spokesman Anthony Guglielmi told FactCheck.org in an email: “We have no information on Mr. Smollett being related to Senator Harris.” Reference: https://www.factcheck.org/2019/02/no-evidence-sen-harris-smollett-are-related/ published on 2019-02-28 18:40:12

- Following the arrest of Jussie Smollett on Thursday, with the “Empire” star facing charges of filing a false police report and disorderly conduct after allegedly staging an attack, celebrities and politicians were quick to weigh in on social media. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/variety/celebrities-politicians-react-to-jussie-smollett-arrest-this-story-is-pathetic-idUSL3N20G6WR published on 2019-02-21 23:11:51

- The news sparked outrage on social media, but some questioned Smollett’s account. The Chicago police have not found any surveillance video evidence and have made no arrests. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/people-jussie-smollett-idINKCN1Q30CO published on 2019-02-14 04:06:09

- Several other right-wing commentators denounced the actor’s actions, and wondered if Democratic politicians, like Kamala Harris and Cory Booker, would retract their initial support of Smollett. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/variety/celebrities-politicians-react-to-jussie-smollett-arrest-this-story-is-pathetic-idUSL3N20G6WR published on 2019-02-21 23:11:51

- Social media conspiracy theories, however, have tried to further link the presidential contender with Smollett by erroneously claiming that she is his aunt. Reference: https://www.factcheck.org/2019/02/no-evidence-sen-harris-smollett-are-related/ published on 2019-02-28 18:40:12
- Chicago police said they are investigating the incident as a possible hate crime. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/people-jussie-smollett-idINKCN1Q30CO published on 2019-02-14 04:06:09
tweet_category: Human Rights, Social Issues, and Activism
tweet_text: .@JussieSmollett is one of the kindest, most gentle human beings I know. I’m praying for his quick recovery. This was an attempted modern day lynching. No one should have to fear for their life because of their sexuality or color of their skin. We must confront this hate.
user_description: Fighting for the people. Wife, Momala, Auntie. She/her. Official account is @VP.
